other.property: 'false' if (type1 in 'none' or type2 in 'none') else 'String.IsEqual(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]) + String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(WidgetFocus$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]),2)'

'false' if (type1 in 'none' or type2 in 'none' or type3 in 'none') else 'String.IsEqual(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]) + String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(WidgetFocus$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]),3)'

'false' if (type1 in 'none' or type2 in 'none' or type3 in 'none' or type4 in 'none') else 'String.IsEqual(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]) + String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(WidgetFocus$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]),4)'

'false' if (type1 in 'none' or type2 in 'none' or type3 in 'none' or type4 in 'none' or type5 in 'none') else 'String.IsEqual(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]) + String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(WidgetFocus$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]),5)'

'false' if (type1 in 'none' or type2 in 'none' or type3 in 'none' or type4 in 'none' or type5 in 'none' or type6 in 'none') else 'String.IsEqual(Container(9000).ListItem.Property(id),$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]) + String.IsEqual(Window(home).Property(WidgetFocus$SKINSHORTCUTS[id]),6)'

propertyGroup.name: widgetSmall
propertyGroup.property: 'true' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'squareicon' and casemusic in 'true' else 'false'
'true' if (type in 'movies' or type in 'episodes' or type in 'tvshows') and art in 'portraiticon' and casevideo in 'true' else 'false'

'248' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'squareicon' and casemusic in 'true' else '265' if art in 'squareicon' else '300' if art in 'portraiticon' else '218'
'265.7' if art in 'squareicon' else '206.65' if art in 'portraiticon' else '372'

'' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'squareicon' and casemusic in 'true' else '' if (type in 'movies' or type in 'episodes' or type in 'tvshows') and art in 'portraiticon' and casevideo in 'true' else 'diffuse/rounded5-290x290.png' if art in 'squareicon' else 'diffuse/rounded5-212x319.png' if art in 'portraiticon' else 'diffuse/rounded5-445x250.png'

'32,14,14,14' if (type in 'albums' or type in 'songs' or type in 'musicvideos') and art in 'squareicon' and casemusic in 'true' else '15,31,15,17' if (type in 'movies' or type in 'episodes' or type in 'tvshows') and art in 'portraiticon' and casevideo in 'true' else '10'
'WidgetPosterInfoContainer' if type in 'info' and (art in 'squareicon' or art in 'landscapeicon') else 'WidgetFanartInfoContainer' if type in 'info' and art in 'fanart' else 'WidgetContainer'
'true' if (type in 'movies' or type in 'episodes' or type in 'tvshows' or type in 'musicvideos') and statuswatched in 'true' else 'false'
'33' if art in 'portraiticon' and casevideo in 'true' else '18'
